title: Group portrait of Homewood Little League Cardinals "Cards" baseball team, front row from left: Kevin Thompson, Darryl Thompson, William King, D. James, G. Meachum, Richard Britton; H. Trent, D. Jenkins, J. Paxton, E. Graves, Richard C. Fox Sr., D. Ragland, B. Terry, R. Fluker, coach Troy Steward; rear: manager Gerald W. Fox, and Val Cherry, posed in front of William "Woogie" Harris' house, 7101 Apple Street, with woman lying on hillside in background, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
